0000000_01000_00000_000_00110_0010011//addi x6, x0, 8
0000000_00101_00110_101_00111_0110011//srl x7, x6, x5   answer:x7=1
0000000_00111_00101_010_00001_0100011//sb x7, x5, 1
0000000_01111_00000_000_01000_0010011//addi x8, x0, 15 
0000000_01111_00000_000_01000_0010011//addi x8, x0, 15 
0000000_00001_00101_101_00110_0000011//lb, x6, x5, 1
